original_text: But once there were seven brothers. The oldest brother married a woman. Then he died before they had any children.
korean_text: 그런데 칠 형제가 있었는데 맏이가 아내를 취하였다가 자식이 없이 죽고

sentences.original_text: But once there were seven brothers
The oldest brother married a woman
Then he died before they had any children
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그들이 자녀를 갖기 전에 그가 죽었습니다
